abstract: Although optimistic, some analysts are still taking a wait-and-see attitude regarding the recovery of companies like I.B.M. and Google.
snippet: Although optimistic, some analysts are still taking a wait-and-see attitude regarding the recovery of companies like I.B.M. and Google.
lead_paragraph: The calendar says we are well on our way to winter, but for many technology companies, orders are starting to bloom like flowers after a spring rain.

headline.main: The Tech Sector Trumpets Signs of a Real Rebound
headline.print_headline: The Tech Sector Trumpets Signs of a Real Rebound

abstract: Google, which posted higher-than-expected third-quarter profits and revenues, said it was looking for major acquisitions and could buy a large company “maybe every year or two.”
snippet: Google, which posted higher-than-expected third-quarter profits and revenues, said it was looking for major acquisitions and could buy a large company “maybe every year or two.”
lead_paragraph: Google‘s growth machine is back in gear.

headline.main: Back on Growth Track, Google Eyes Deals
